verses.text: I \w will|strong="H1004"\w* give \w you|strong="H1004"\w* praise \w and|strong="H1004"\w* honour, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* Lord, because through \w you|strong="H1004"\w* I \w have|strong="H1004"\w* been lifted up; \w you|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* given \w my|strong="H1732"\w* haters cause \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* glad over \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* sent \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H8055"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w* well.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* made \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul come again \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* underworld: \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given \w me|strong="H0413"\w* life \w and|strong="H3068"\w* kept \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* going down \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* dead.

\w Make|strong="H3381"\w* songs \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* saints \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5927"\w* praise \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy name.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w is|strong="H3068"\w* only \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* minute; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* grace \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* life; weeping \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* night, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* joy comes \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* things went well \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7522"\w* never \w be|strong="H7281"\w* moved.

Lord, \w by|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0559"\w* grace \w you|strong="H5769"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* kept \w my|strong="H0559"\w* mountain strong: \w when|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H0559"\w* face \w was|strong="H0559"\w* turned from \w me|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w was|strong="H0559"\w* troubled.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

What profit \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* blood \w if|strong="H2603"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* go \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* underworld? \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* dust give \w you|strong="H0413"\w* praise, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* witness \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* help?

\w Give|strong="H3034"\w* ear \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w O|strong="H3034"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w have|strong="H0571"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: Lord, be \w my|strong="H5046"\w* helper.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sorrow \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* dancing; \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* away \w my|strong="H8085"\w* clothing \w of|strong="H3068"\w* grief, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* robes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* joy;

So that \w my|strong="H8242"\w* glory may make songs \w of|strong="H8057"\w* praise \w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w you|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H8242"\w* not be quiet. O Lord \w my|strong="H8242"\w* God, I will \w give|strong="H2015"\w* \w you|strong="H8057"\w* praise \w for|strong="H8057"\w* ever.
